Summary: Saw a fire like orange orb before the new year at around 11pm
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at a family party when my wife came inside and told me to come and look at this orb.It really looks like a small fireball that would change direction and just dissapeared.Would really love to know what this is.It is pretty well documented on the web and youtube.
